mapper.select: select M.MONTH||'월' as "month" , (select count(*) from approval where approval_no in (select min(approval_no) from approval where to_char(approval_time, 'YYYY') = '${approvalCnt_year}' and company_code = ${company_code} and report_code = 1 group by r_no) and emp_no = ${emp_no} and M.MONTH = to_char(approval.approval_time, 'MM')) as "daily" , (select count(*) from approval where approval_no in (select min(approval_no) from approval where to_char(approval_time, 'YYYY') = '${approvalCnt_year}' and company_code = ${company_code} and report_code = 2 group by r_no) and emp_no = ${emp_no} and M.MONTH = to_char(approval.approval_time, 'MM')) as "expense" , (select count(*) from approval where approval_no in (select min(approval_no) from approval where to_char(approval_time, 'YYYY') = '${approvalCnt_year}' and company_code = ${company_code} and report_code = 3 group by r_no) and emp_no = ${emp_no} and M.MONTH = to_char(approval.approval_time, 'MM')) as "sales" from ( SELECT '01' "MONTH" FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '02' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '03' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '04' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '05' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '06' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '07' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '08' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '09' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '10' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '11' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '12' FROM DUAL ) M

select report_type_code.type_name as "type_name" , (select count(*) from where r_no in (select r_no from approval where approval_no in (select min(approval_no) from approval where to_char(approval_time, 'YYYY') = '${typeNo_year}' and company_code = ${company_code} and report_code = ${typeNo_reportCode} group by r_no) and emp_no = ${emp_no}) and company_code = ${company_code} and report_type_code.type_code = .type_code) as "cnt" from report_type_code where report_type_code.report_code = ${typeNo_reportCode}

select M.MONTH||'월' as "month" , (select count(*) from approval where approval_no in (select min(approval_no) from approval where to_char(approval_time, 'YYYY') = '${approvalCnt_year}' and company_code = ${company_code} and report_code = 1 group by r_no) and company_code = ${company_code} and M.MONTH = to_char(approval.approval_time, 'MM')) as "daily" , (select count(*) from approval where approval_no in (select min(approval_no) from approval where to_char(approval_time, 'YYYY') = '${approvalCnt_year}' and company_code = ${company_code} and report_code = 2 group by r_no) and company_code = ${company_code} and M.MONTH = to_char(approval.approval_time, 'MM')) as "expense" , (select count(*) from approval where approval_no in (select min(approval_no) from approval where to_char(approval_time, 'YYYY') = '${approvalCnt_year}' and company_code = ${company_code} and report_code = 3 group by r_no) and company_code = ${company_code} and M.MONTH = to_char(approval.approval_time, 'MM')) as "sales" from ( SELECT '01' "MONTH" FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '02' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '03' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '04' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '05' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '06' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '07' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '08' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '09' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '10' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '11' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '12' FROM DUAL ) M

select report_type_code.type_name as "type_name" , (select count(*) from where r_no in (select r_no from approval where approval_no in (select min(approval_no) from approval where to_char(approval_time, 'YYYY') = '${typeNo_year}' and company_code = ${company_code} and report_code = ${typeNo_reportCode} group by r_no)) and company_code = ${company_code} and report_type_code.type_code = .type_code) as "cnt" from report_type_code where report_type_code.report_code = ${typeNo_reportCode}

select approval.r_no as "r_no" , approval.report_code as "report_code" , report_type.report_name as "report_name" , employee.name as "emp_name" , employee.img as "emp_img" , dept.dept_name as "dept_name" , jikup.jikup_name as "jikup_name" , (select a3.approval_time from approval a3 where a3.company_code = ${company_code} and a3.emp_no = ${emp_no} and a3.approval_code = 1 and approval.r_no = a3.r_no and approval.report_code = a3.report_code) as "approval_time" from approval, report_type, employee, dept, jikup where approval.approval_no in (select min(a2.approval_no) from approval a1, approval a2 where a1.company_code = ${company_code} and a1.emp_no = ${emp_no} and a1.approval_code = 1 and a1.report_code = a2.report_code and a1.r_no = a2.r_no group by a2.r_no, a2.report_code) and approval.company_code = ${company_code} and report_type.report_code = approval.report_code and employee.emp_no = approval.emp_no and dept.dept_code = employee.dept_code and jikup.jikup_code = employee.jikup_code order by approval.approval_no
